paper.title: Information systems development: a rule-based approach

author.org: Department of Computation, University of Manchester Institute of Science & Technology, Manchester, UK
Department of Computation, University of Manchester Institute of Science & Technology, Manchester, UK

paper.abstract: This paper seeks to demonstrate an approach to software engineering for information systems that will lead not only to good information system creation, but will also explicitly maintain the representation of the business knowledge so as to allow for more effective system evolution and its active exploitation at run time. A rule-based development environment, known as RUBRIC, is described, which serves as the means of achieving these objectives.
